column4: it makes sense they would have their own channel - when doing development you dont want to deal with the clutter of a support channel all the time
they probably work in both channels
imo, such things shouldn't even be on IRC... but if it must be, others lacking technical knowhow should at least have input...
so because I can't code, I can't make suggestions?
desktop oriented devel channels can be quite interesting... also, they are the truely knowledgable, so you learn a lot...
actually, its a good attitude... if you assume they know too much, it will bite you in the butt more often then not..
10 years here.. i am truly insane now
umm, ouch... hah, thats half my life time  :)
the problem is that richard is not just some guy
to me he is just some guy  :/
it certainly does. Hence why I said it should just be changed... the image as it is now + clothes.
I agree it should be changed. Ubuntu is about community, and the new image depicts that better then the logo... but the image should be more professional.
I can't wait for the Netscape purchases to be included in Ubuntu/Fedora  8)
